Create a LDAP Group Map

To create a group map follow the steps below:

 1. In the LDAP Group Map Configuration page, enter the LDAP group name in the Name field.

 2. From the Role drop-down list, select the required default role you wish to assign for the LDAP database.

 3. From the Locale drop-down list, select the locale you wish to assign for the role type.

 4. Click Add to create a LDAP group map for the database.

Figure 3-9 LDAP Group Map
